etymology.description: Depicts a slash or diagonal stroke
etymology.interpretation: The character 丿(piě) represents the simple action of slashing, which is symbolized by a single diagonal line.

examples.chinese: 他写字时巧妙使用丿(他寫字時巧妙使用丿)，展现出独特风格(展現出獨特風格)。
examples.pinyin: tā xiě zì shí qiǎo miào shǐ yòng piě, zhǎn xiàn chū dú tè fēng gé.
examples.english: He skillfully uses the slash stroke when writing, showcasing a unique style.

examples.chinese: 丿是汉字中的一个基本笔画(丿是漢字中的一個基本筆畫)。
examples.pinyin: piě shì hànzì zhōng de yī gè jīběn bǐhuà.
examples.english: ‘Piě’ is a basic stroke in Chinese characters.
